code: import React from'react';import'./idchecker.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Idc(){function cdate(y,m,d){if(m<1||m>12){return false;}if(m===2&&d>29&&y%4!==0){return false;}if((m===1||m===3||m===5||m===7||m===8||m===10||m===12)&&d>31){return false;}if((m===4||m===6||m===9||m===11)&&d>30){return false;}return true;}function gend(g){if(g>4999)return"male";else return"female";}function checksum(c,chec){var s,a,b;var f=0;for(var i=0;i<=10;i+=2){s=chec.substring(i,i+1);f+=parseInt(s);}for(var _i=1;_i<=11;_i+=2){var d=0;var t=0;a=chec.substring(_i,_i+1);t=parseInt(a);t=t*2;if(t>=10){b=t.toString();t=parseInt(b.substring(0,1));d=parseInt(b.substring(1,2));}f+=t+d;d=0;}while(f>9){f=f-10;}if(f===0&&c===0||10-f===c){return true;}else{return false;}}function check(){var txt=document.getElementById('idnum');var res=document.getElementById('info');var me=txt.value;var yy,mm,dd;var gender,gg;var id;yy=me.substring(0,2);mm=me.substring(2,4);dd=me.substring(4,6);var d=parseInt(dd);var m=parseInt(mm);var y=parseInt(yy);gg=me.substring(6,10);var g=parseInt(gg);var che=cdate(y,m,d);if(che===false){res.innerHTML="invalid date id is invalid";}else{gender=gend(g);id=me.substring(12,13);var c=parseInt(id);var val=checksum(c,me);if(val===false){res.innerHTML="invalid id number";}if(val===true){res.innerHTML="ID number is valid:\n";res.innerHTML+=" birthday: "+d+"/"+m+"/"+y+"\n";res.innerHTML+=" gender: "+gender;}}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Idc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"inp",type:"text",id:"idnum"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"but",type:"button",value:"enter",onClick:check}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{class:"output",id:"info",className:"mac"})]});}export default Idc;
